title: Improve F-Droid listing
body:
I've seen this app on F-Droid, but it lacks screenshots, changelog and a translatable description there. It's pretty easy for you to add these information. Please have a look at [this example](https://github.com/Freeyourgadget/Gadgetbridge/tree/master/fastlane/metadata/android) or at the [F-Droid docs](https://f-droid.org/en/docs/All_About_Descriptions_Graphics_and_Screenshots/#in-the-apps-source-repository) or [fastlane docs](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/2.28.7/supply/README.md#images-and-screenshots).
After you have commited these files to your repo and tagged a new version, you need to remove the `Description` and `Summary` from the metadata file in the [F-Droid Data repo](https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroiddata).

title: Writing SSID to Log
body:
Hi, while doing some analysis on your app, we noticed that it writes the current SSID to log. While on Android version 4.1 and above the log is safe, on earlier versions, other apps can access the log (your app requires version 2.3.3 and up). 

The SSID is considered sensitive information as it can be used to profile the user location based on the current connection.

title: Updated target and theme
body:
Hi! To start my open-source work, I'm looking for Android apps that haven't been updated in a while and updating them to Android Oreo compatibility. This app is my first!

My changes:
- Updated compileSdkVersion to 26
- Updated buildToolsVersion to 26.0.1
- Updated minSdkVersion to 21
- Updated targetSdkVersion to 26
- Updated dependencies
- Commented out signingConfigs in build.gradle as the required file could not be found
- Updated app theme to Material Light with Dark ActionBar
- Updated actionBar icons to Material icons
- Changed 'Clear' text in menu to 'Clear log' for clarity

title: Added ADB Manager in alternativeto.net
body:
First time I add anything there and since there was only ADB WiFi, which is not open source **AND** the form to add an alternative to it was **only two fields**, app name and short description, I added your app there. Nice trick, everytime I submitted a form another one appeared asking for more info that I did not ever realised that other apps there were providing too. I left some optional fields blank and maybe u want to fill them, up to you. I assume you will b able to edit all fields, if any. Otherwise, let me know and I'll update it.

[ADB Manager in alternativeto.net](http://alternativeto.net/software/adb-manager/)

title: ADB over Ethernet
body:
Hi,

I need to start on boot ADB services, and you application is the only one which offers this.

The only problem I have is that my Android box is connected to Ethernet.

Does your application also support ADB over Ethernet?

If not is it possible to Request this feature for the next release?

Thank you and regards,

title: [Feature request] An option to stop the running service
body: As soon as the app launches, the service is started in the background. There is no option in the interface to stop it. Yet it consumes resources and it is hardly a good idea to keep such service running on a device that is used for purposes other than development. Would you consider adding such option in the interface?

title: Listening on mobile IP instead of wifi IP.
label: [Label(name="bug"), Label(name="invalid")]
body:
Hi there,
I just installed this app from F-Droid, Version 1.0.9, on my Huawei Ascend P6 with Android 4.4.2 (Omni ROM).
For some reason it appearently detects my mobile ISPs IP instead instead of my wifi IP to listen on:
![Screenshot](https://s3.amazonaws.com/pushbullet-uploads/ujCHJDyZ0xw-bJTByLdy64Dt7YjWGKL0B0OH5GnFSDdq/Screenshot_2014-05-02-15-11-50.png)

title: License please?
body: I think it would be a good app to have on f-droid.org. For that though, you'd need to cover it with a license. see http://choosealicense.com for a quick overview.
